label: 🌱 Little ones (0–12)
description: Work with children during their **most formative years** - from `birth to 12`
feedbackMessage: Early childhood education is incredibly rewarding! 85% of early childhood graduates report high job satisfaction, working with children from birth to 12 years.

label: 📚 Primary kids (5–12)
description: Build **foundational skills** in *reading, writing, and numeracy*
feedbackMessage: 70% of students pursuing Bachelor of Teaching in Primary Education enrol as double degree students for broader career opportunities!

label: 🎒 Kids & teens (5–18)
description: Teach across **both levels** for *maximum flexibility* and variety
feedbackMessage: Teaching across both primary and secondary levels opens up amazing career flexibility! You'll be qualified to teach students aged 5-18.

label: 🎤 Teens (12–18)
description: Specialize in **subject areas** and help teens prepare for their *future*
feedbackMessage: Secondary teaching is in high demand! 90% of secondary education graduates find employment within 6 months of graduating.

label: 🔀 Double degree with Arts/Business/Fine Art/Music/Science
description: Combine education with **another field** for *broader career options*
feedbackMessage: Double degree students often find more diverse career opportunities! Same 4 years, double the expertise and career options.

label: 🎯 Straight up Primary Education
description: Focus **solely on teaching** - deep dive into *educational theory* and practice
feedbackMessage: Focused primary education degrees provide deep specialisation! You'll be teaching across all key learning areas from Foundation to Year 6.

label: 💪 Yep, Health & PE is my jam
description: Combine **physical activity** with *health education* - keep kids active and healthy

label: 🙅‍♀️ Not really my thing
description: Focus on **academic subjects** rather than *physical education*

label: 💖 Super important — make it my focus
description: Specialize in supporting students with **diverse learning needs** and *disabilities*
feedbackMessage: Inclusive education specialists are desperately needed! You'll be making a real difference supporting diverse learners and championing inclusion.

label: 🤷 Not really my thing
description: Focus on **mainstream teaching** across *general curriculum areas*
feedbackMessage: General primary and secondary education offers incredible variety! You'll teach across different year levels and can specialise later.

label: 🎭 Arts, languages & media
description: Inspire **creativity** through *languages, humanities, media* and cultural studies
feedbackMessage: Arts, languages and media teachers inspire creativity! You'll choose two teaching areas from languages, humanities, media, psychology and more.

label: 💼 Business & economics
description: Teach **financial literacy** and prepare students for the *business world*
feedbackMessage: Business and economics teachers are highly valued! You'll be preparing students for real-world financial literacy and career success.

label: 🎶 Music
description: Combine your **musical passion** with *teaching the next generation*
feedbackMessage: Music education combines passion with pedagogy! You'll be inspiring the next generation of musicians and music lovers.

label: 🔬 Science & digital tech
description: Teach **STEM subjects** - maths, sciences, or *digital technologies*
feedbackMessage: STEM teachers are in huge demand! Choose from maths, biology, chemistry, physics, psychology or digital technologies.

label: 🎨 Visual arts
description: Nurture **artistic creativity** and *visual expression* in teenagers
feedbackMessage: Visual arts teachers nurture creativity! This double degree format gives you both artistic expertise and teaching skills.

label: 🏃 Health & PE
description: Focus on **physical fitness** and *health education* for adolescents
feedbackMessage: Secondary HPE specialists are essential! You can even add a third teaching area like business or maths for extra versatility.
